prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast, chibi proportions with large translucent flowing Crystalline head with unique Vesica_Piscis structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating Vesica_Piscis, Fibonacci_spiral patterns, styled with Principality influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Golden and neutral grey inspired by intelligence fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns fused with stellar alignment vests and planetary symbol tunics with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, incorporating flowing silk for cosmic movement, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and Vesica_Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design combined with Astrolabe pendant with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor SAMAPHA's profile: 'He who is with continuity', Aethyr ZOM, Water element, Tarot Strength, Sephirot Tiphareth, Zodiac Leo, embodying the essence: 'When SAMAPHA is near, a golden thread of continuity weaves through the atmosphere, ensuring identity endures through every transformation.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent flowing Crystalline head with unique Vesica_Piscis structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating Vesica_Piscis, Fibonacci_spiral patterns, styled with Principality influences

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns fused with stellar alignment vests and planetary symbol tunics
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, incorporating flowing silk for cosmic movement
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design combined with Astrolabe pendant
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who is with continuity'
profile_data.essence: When SAMAPHA is near, a golden thread of continuity weaves through the atmosphere, ensuring identity endures through every transformation.
profile_data.angelic_role: Principality of Golden Continuum; leads deluge-born bringers.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, flowing water-crystal form that continuously reshapes, representing the golden thread of continuity. Crystalline edges suggest structure within fluidity, echoing the Strength card's balanced dynamic between softness and rigidity.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Golden represents Tiphareth's solar essence and divine intelligence; deep blue symbolizes Water element's emotional depth and ZOM Aethyr's transformative mysteries
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometric forms representing birth, transformation, and divine proportionality
